EmailTemplate.name: AM application DOB correction form
EmailTemplate.subject: Please re-submit your date of birth for your Associate Mentor application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We need your date of birth again!
Unfortunately there was a problem submitting date of birth on your application.
Please confirm your correct date of birth by filling in this form: https://docs.google.com/a/the-challenge.org/forms/d/1g5CTxsGf-jH-NHarmFb5E2gPnHnZXUy2GXC_5iP3i4U/viewform
If you have any questions, then please email us at graduates@the-challenge.org.
